short_summary: Indigenous Services Canada requires the implementation of an Electronic Dental Records system for the collection, management, storage, and sharing of dental patient data and information for the Atlantic Region.
description: The contract will last from Contract award to March 31, 2027 and have four (4) option periods. It is intended to result in the award of one contract for the delivery of the services.
full_summary:
## Electronic Dental Records System for Indigenous Services Canada
### Tender Information

* **Title:** Electronic Dental Records System for Indigenous Services Canada
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01021596
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Publication Date:** January 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2023, 9:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Goods and Services

* **Good/Service Category:** SRV
* **GSIN:** *D302A, N7030
* **Description:** Informatics Professional Services, ADP Software

### Trade Agreements

* **Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Contracting Entity

* **Name:** Indigenous Services Canada
* **Address:** 10 Wellington St., Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0H4, Canada

### End User Entity

* **Name:** Indigenous Services Canada
* **Address:** 10 Wellington St., Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0H4, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Miriam Britel
* **Email:** [miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 873 355 2463
* **Fax:** None

### Tender Description

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking proposals to implement an Electronic Dental Records (EDR) system for the Atlantic Region. The proposed system will enable the collection, management, storage, and sharing of dental patient data and information. The proposed contract is for a term of approximately 4.25 years, with an initial start date of contract award and four (4) option
